newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Toro Co reinitiated at hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Toro Co reinitiated at hold.

text.p: -- Dain Bosworth Inc said Wednesday it reinitiated coverage of Toro Co with a hold rating.

-- Dain said it is prepared to upgrade the rating to buy once it sees evidence that Toro has turned around its consumer and commercial segments. The commercial and irrigation segments have higher growth and profitability than the consumer segment, Dain said.
-- Dain set its estimate for earnings in the second quarter at $1.50 a share, and earnings for all of fiscal 1997 at $3.10 a share. Fiscal 1998 earnings should reach $3.65 a share, Dain said.
-- Toro makes and markets lawn care products, for consumer and commercial markets.
-- Its shares were unchanged Wednesday at 34-1/8.
